package.name: freya/freya
package.description: Freya is a Framework designed to allow you to quickly and easily develop WP themes based on configuration and data structures that then translate to powerful and easy to use themes. Based around Zend Framework 2 and Themosis, we use concepts such as MVC to help orgnaize data.
